4 DAYS 3 NIGHTS

Bangkok - Pattaya 4D3N by Air Asia

Overview List Itinerary

This exciting package takes you to Thailand's most popular destinations: the bustling metropolis of Bangkok and the vibrant beach resort town of Pattaya. Fly comfortably with Air Asia and enjoy a perfect blend of cultural exploration, thrilling adventures, and relaxing beach time.
